channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Biden’s Big Shift on Ukraine, and Neo-Nazi Marchers Shock Ohio
Spirit Airlines files for bankruptcy as it tries to recover from failed sale to JetBlue
item.description: Spirit, the biggest U.S. budget airline, has lost more than $2.5 billion since the start of 2020 and faces looming debt payments totaling more than $1...

item.title: As Trump Looms, Biden Makes a Last-Ditch Pitch to Global Leaders
item.description: The president approved Ukraine’s use of long-range missiles inside Russia, but that decision, among others, may soon be reversed.

item.title: How Tom Brady created a culture of winning as an NFL quarterback
item.description: Tom Brady discussed the leadership traits that lead to consistent wins.

item.title: I Tried to Teach My Son Soccer. Here’s What He Taught Me.
item.description: After decades reporting on soccer, three months helping to coach a team of children under age 7 came as a revelation.

item.title: Freed From Restraints, Ukraine Is Poised to Strike Into Russia
item.description: President Biden has granted permission for Kyiv to carry out long-range strikes, and his Ukrainian counterpart said the launches would come soon.

item.title: Coffee, Juice, Shawarma: Tiny Traces of Normal Life in a Ruined Gaza
item.description: Most people in the enclave are struggling just to survive Israel’s assault on Hamas, and experts say famine is imminent. Yet a few pockets of ordinary...

item.title: FDIC boss credits one simple technology for helping more Americans than ever get a bank account
item.description: A simple banking innovation solves nearly every problem unbanked users say keeps them from getting an account.

item.title: French tech mogul Xavier Niel warns that Europe will be reduced to an ‘abandoned’ continent if it misses this crucial opportunity
item.description: Xavier Niel has had a hand in advancing Europe's tech foothold—like his investment into France's Mistral AI. Still, he worries Europe will slip behind...

item.title: Trump wants to ease U.S. rules for self-driving cars
item.description: It would directly benefit Tesla CEO Elon Musk.

item.title: As Trump Looms, Biden Makes a Last-Ditch Pitch to Global Leaders
item.description: The president approved Ukraine’s use of long-range missiles inside Russia, but that decision, among others, may soon be reversed.

item.title: Israeli Strikes in Beirut’s Center Shatter a Tenuous Sense of Security
item.description: The strikes, the first for weeks inside Lebanon’s capital, forced residents to come to grips with another escalation of violence.

item.title: Record 146,000 N.Y.C. Public School Students Were Homeless Last Year
item.description: The figure topped 100,000 for a ninth straight year, state data shows, as the city dealt with a continuing housing crisis and an influx of migrants.

item.title: Elon Musk’s Political Influence
item.description: We explore Musk’s agenda and ideology.
